interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Review Date: 2020/11/20 Store: Karuna Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} Review Text: This is a really great sheet mask pack. It hits all your skincare needs. These are the cloth style masks which I always find have more serum, better sticking power and a better fit than the hydrogel masks.

The eye patches I especially liked. They're packed full of serum, stay on well and cover the whole under eye and side area. The brightening face mask did seem to make my skin more even and brighter but it does say not for sensitive skin. I do sometimes have some sensitivity issues but didn't experience that with any of the masks.

There's enough serum in all the masks that you can use the excess the next day as a serum or swipe over your décolletage. I like to keep my masks in the fridge. They feel great when they're chilled. This is definitely a product I'll be buying again. Review Title: great selection. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[Weekly Point Cosmetic Rose edition mask sheet] - Facial skin care mask sheet 3solutions(Wriklecare, Brighten up, Moisture) in one (1Pack of 10pcs) Weekly Point Cosmetic {'Brand': 'Weekly Point Cosmetic', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture,Skin', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 4.84 x 7.01 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} I’ve been using sheet masks for years. Long before they became something you could buy at your local pharmacy so I’m used to reading the adorable translations on the back (see photo)

That aside the mask is a little on the small side and I think I have an average sized face. It does stretch though and the benefit is that it doesn’t get in your hair. Lots of serum with this one, or mask juice as I like to call it
so at the end of the mask time you have enough to apply extra to your face a neck.

I left it for the full 20 minutes and my skin did feel soft and moisturised. I used it after a transatlantic flight and my skin really needed the hydration. Obviously you won’t see any miracles after one use but do make it part of your weekly or twice weekly routine for maximum effect.

Don’t be tempted to leave it on longer or sleep with it. All masks will just dry out and negate the benefits.

This is a nice addition to my sheet mask collection. Lovely and hydrating. Glass Nail File - JORLAI 2PC Nano Nail Shiner Nail Files Polisher Glass Nail Buffers Professional Crystal Manicure Tools Kit for Natural Nails JORLAI {'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '712322500167'} These are very cute and sparkly and come in their own case. I like that they’re nice and small and the thickness is great for shaping the sides of your nails. I found the buffing part slow going and it took quite a while to build up a shine but I’m happy with the end result. My nails took a real beating from gel so I’m giving them a break from all polish and this really helps build a lovely shine. Gives a good natural shine Travel Friendly Face Cleanser, Quick Cleansing Dry Tissue 20 Packs - Dry Facial Wipes Makeup Remover Travel Size, Exfoliating Wipes For Face a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '20', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 2.76 x 3.94 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} This is a solid five stars. I'm a flight attendant and it's such a pain to have to take a variety of products when you travel and some countries have liquid restrictions.

I used this as soon as I got to my hotel with low expectations that were quickly blown away. You use wet it with warm water and it takes off all makeup including mascara. You rinse with water afterwards but it's not overly soapy so you don't have to worry about getting soap in your eyes. I've used this at home and then used a cotton wool pad with my usual makeup remover expecting some residue makeup but nothing was left. I'm so impressed with these and as one pad will take off all your makeup it's really good value. Sensational Bodipure Baking Soda Natural Vegetable Sport Bar Soap 3 Pack - Refreshing & Cooling Mint - Deodorizing Cleanser for Face and Body - 4 oz. ea Bodipure {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All, Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Bodipure', 'Scent': 'Clean, natural mint', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 2.25 x 1 inches; 14.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '838347004388', 'Manufacturer': 'Bodipure, Inc.'} The best soap I’ve used bar none. Seriously.

I came in from the garden where I’d been stacking a cord of firewood and planting bulbs. My hands were filthy and cracked. This soap made the dirt dissolve immediately. I know that’s what soap does but with this it just vanishes without even having to scrub, even from under my nails. It has a light mint scent and isn’t drying at all. I didn’t know I could get that excited about washing my hands. I tried it in the shower and my skin felt clean and smooth without feeling dry. Even my husband who doesn’t like anything remotely “girly” was a fan.

The hand mask that came with it was lovely and moisturising. The best soap I’ve used. Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Karuna {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} This is a really great sheet mask pack. It hits all your skincare needs. These are the cloth style masks which I always find have more serum, better sticking power and a better fit than the hydrogel masks.

The eye patches I especially liked. They're packed full of serum, stay on well and cover the whole under eye and side area. The brightening face mask did seem to make my skin more even and brighter but it does say not for sensitive skin. I do sometimes have some sensitivity issues but didn't experience that with any of the masks.

There's enough serum in all the masks that you can use the excess the next day as a serum or swipe over your décolletage. I like to keep my masks in the fridge. They feel great when they're chilled. This is definitely a product I'll be buying again. great selection.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Body Care Enthusiast:** The user is passionate about skincare, with a keen interest in sheet masks, hydrating routines, and effective cleansers that nourish and restore skin.
- **Hydration Focus:** Prioritizes moisture and hydration, especially post-travel, favoring products that offer restorative and non-drying benefits.
- **Routine-Oriented:** Maintains a consistent regimen, incorporating various skincare and body care elements, including masks and cleansers, to achieve optimal results.
- **Quality Over Quantity:** Values sustainable, gradual outcomes over quick fixes, demonstrating patience in their personal care journey.
- **Sensory Preferences:** Enjoys pleasant scents and a delightful sensory experience in products, with a penchant for natural and refreshing aromas.
- **User-Friendly Products:** Prefers easy-to-use items that integrate seamlessly into their routine.
- **Value for Money:** Seeks products that deliver significant benefits, maximizing effectiveness with each application.
- **Analytical Reviewer:** Engages in thoughtful feedback, providing detailed insights on product performance.
- **Nail Care Interest:** Actively explores nail care, favoring tools that enhance nails’ natural appearance alongside functionality.
- **Travel Considerations:** Shows interest in travel-friendly products that simplify skincare management in restrictive conditions.
- **Effective Cleansing Preference:** Recently reinforced commitment to effective cleansing products that deliver reliable results, enhancing their overall regimen.
